sentences.sContent: Other people’s houses always intrigued her.
sentences.sCn: 别人的房子总令她好奇。

synos.tran: 阴谋；诡计；复杂的事；私通

remMethod.val: in + trig(=tric小障碍物) + ue → 在里面放入很多小障碍物 → 密谋

words.tran: [法] 密谋者，阴谋者；私通者
引起…的兴趣；策划阴谋；私通（intrigue的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: if something intrigues you, it interests you a lot because it seems strange or mysterious
